issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: CBO
components.description: All issues dealing with Hive's cost based optimizer and its interaction with Optiq

fields.description:
In the following plan, {{_o__col4}} is not needed:

{code}
2018-02-11T11:35:14,501 DEBUG [0fda1a20-c7f1-489e-b287-65f35fda9848 main] calcite.sql2rel: Plan after trimming unused fields
HiveProject(download_volume_bytes=[$0], ri_date=[$1], end_cell_id=[$2], environment=[$3])
  HiveSortLimit(sort0=[$2], dir0=[ASC-nulls-first], fetch=[100])
    HiveProject(download_volume_bytes=[$4], ri_date=[$3], end_cell_id=[$1], environment=[$2], _o__col4=[$0])
      HiveAggregate(group=[{0, 1, 2, 3}], agg#0=[sum($4)])
        HiveProject($f0=[$1], $f1=[$2], $f2=[$3], $f3=[$0], $f4=[$4])
          HiveProject(ri_date=[$0], imsi=[$1], end_cell_id=[$2], environment=[$3], s1_u_download_data_volume=[$4])
            HiveTableScan(table=[[default.lsr094]], table:alias=[a])
{code}

{{_o__col4}} should be removed by the FieldTrimmer. Otherwise, this may prevent MV rewriting to be triggered on some queries containing order by/limit clauses.
fields.summary: FieldTrimmer missing opportunity with SortLimit operators
